attributes.action: license the traffic wardens or parking attendants
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To become a parking attendant and also a traffic warden all you need to know is how to book avehicle. Any body can do that. Where as a parking attendant should have the qualifications like a city and guild in parking management or a edexcel in parking awareness or something similar and they should know when and when not to ticket a vehicle. at the moment more parking attendants only know basic english and are shown a the basics to how a parking contravenetion has happenned and off they go.
